keywords.keyword: Oh my lady is fair as the morning

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Oh my lady is fair as the morning oh my lady is sweet as the dew But my lady dwells in far Atlantia So I'll sleep at Estrella with you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh her smile is as bright as the sunrise And her voice like a nightingale's song I would fly to her side in an instant If the journey were not quite so long

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh my lady is gentle and lovely Thoughts of her warm my heart, it is true But my lady's not here at Outlandish So I'll dance by the fire for you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Oh her laughter is like sweetest music And her green eyes like emeralds shine bright I am certain that she will be grateful That you kept me from freezing last night

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Oh my lady is surely an angel Twas pure torture to bid her adieu But she could not fly her to this mountain So I'll go to the hot springs with you

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Oh I carry her favor in battle For her honor I gladly would die But if she can't make it to Pennsic I'm not gonna sit down and cry

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Oh my lady is fair as the morning With a voice like a nightingale's song I would fly to her side in an instant If the journey were not quite so long
